name: On The Window Sill
description:
Have you ever wanted to grow your own plant, but lack the skill to not kill anything you touch? Do you like pixelated sprites and lo-fi hip hop? Are you really, really bored? If you answered YES to any of these questions, then On The Window Sill is the game for you!

Features:

-Grow your own plant, with colours unique to you! No two colours are the same!
-29 cosmetic items!
-Unlock your own plant pots, and grow 4 different varieties of plant buddies!
-Play different minigames with your cute lil' plant; raise its level and watch it grow!
-Has a Bonsai Tree
-Real-Time background for our little plant boy!
-Coded entirely by one person, FlyAway
-30 mins of soundtrack created by RainbowFrog
-Featuring sprites made by Purple_Toaster
-Did we mention there's a Bonsai Tree?

Play the game now for FREE, and bring LIFE into this world!

"We hope you enjoy this experience. Your enjoyment is very important to us."

-RBY

Additional Controls

Alt + Enter = Fullscreen

Hold esc to quit.
